overview:
United Power

Established in the year 2002, we, United Power are one of the reputed manufacturers, exporters, importers and suppliers of a wide range of electrical products, conduit pipes & accessories. These products are renowned for their high-end features such as easy installation, dimensional accuracy, resistance to corrosion and abrasion. Being a client centric organization, we also provide customized solutions as per clients industry specific requirements.

We have well established infrastructure with state-of-the-art facilities for manufacturing, warehousing and quality testing. The production unit is equipped with advanced machines that allow us to manufacture electrical products and conduit pipes & accessories in compliance with defined industry standard.

We make use of following machines in the production process:

Lathe machines
Cutting machines

Some of the factors that have fueled our success are as follows:

International quality standards
Customized solutions
Well equipped infrastructure

Phone : +(91)-(731)-4046847
